ModMetaData.name: Replace Stuff Mod Compatibility
ModMetaData.author: Garethp
ModMetaData.description:
A patch for Replace Stuff to introduce compatibility for various mods. Replace ship walls and reactors without having to remove them first
Mods included in this patch so far are: * Save Our Ship 2 * Vanilla Furniture Expanded (Core) * Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Security * Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Power
